items.sentence: Tom nearly had a heart attack when he saw Mary standing on the edge of the roof.
Tom and his children spent all afternoon looking for the perfect Christmas tree.
Tom apparently hasn\'t yet told Mary that he won\'t be going to Boston with her.
Tom and Mary were yelling at each other when I passed by their house last night.
Tom speaks two languages, but he doesn\'t sound like a native speaker of either.
When you speak French, do you think people understand what you're trying to say?
He believed that blacks could win their fight for equal rights without violence.
Peer pressure often forces people to do things they know that they shouldn't do.
We must learn to live together as brothers, or we will perish together as fools.
The bacteria that are transferred during a kiss help improve your immune system.
